name: HEREGES
description:
This game is a work of fantasy. TheMorganah believes that just like movies, games are a type of entertainment and every artistic freedom should be respected. However, the developer neither encourages nor approves any manifestation of hatred or violence herein and recommends player discretion.

Common sense is appreciated. Thank you.

HEREGES: The gruesome RPG is a game that follows the manga universe created by Thales Carvalho, when he was still studying at a Christian school in 2012. HEREGES follows the narrative of imperfect protagonists in a world doomed by cruelty, a curse that has existed since the born of mankind.

The premise is that each game will have its own theme and will unfold according to the protagonist's behavior. Although the manga universe has events in other countries, the main story of HEREGES takes place mainly in Japan through connected characters.

Life was peaceful in Okinawa after local delinquents ceased the violent war between schools thanks to the courage of a criminal named Nathaniel Hope who defeated his nemesis Yamazaki, the chairman of the juvenile crime tribunal. Unfortunately, peace did not last for long.

One year after the suicide of Chihiro, Nathaniel's girlfriend and daughter of Nagisawa's principal, a mysterious group called The Circle sacrifices mankind in a bloody event waiting for Ubermensch, the messenger of the new apocalypse.

In this game you control Sayuri Sakura, the president of the Nagisawa student council. Despite her prepotency, Sayuri is a fragile girl who cares more about others than herself and will do anything to keep her school safe, even if she needs the help of people she hates.


  • The biggest overworld to explore in a RPGmaker game yet.
  • An original, DRM free experience.
  • Straight to the point, no fanservice.
  • Over more than 100 bosses to kill.
  • Demons speak in deutsch and italian.
  • Dynamic difficulty based on distance.
  • Fast travel through local checkpoints.
  • Realistic, fast pacing combat.
  • Over 12 survivors to be rescued and recruted.
  • In-game achievement system.
  • Funny password system.
  • True 16-bit visuals.
  • Experimental soundtrack.*
  • And more...!

*The material present in the prototype is a third-party demonstration and will not remain in the final version.

HEREGES is a game in development. In the current version, you can:

  • Watch the partial game intro.
  • Explore your main hideout, the Safehouse.
  • Explore the first area of the game.
  • Initiate fights against human enemies.

The full version will be commercialized (no price defined) and this prototype may get updated until the demo version. If you are interested in the project, please follow the developement through my social media.
